01917 
01918 def PerformBuild(data, configurations, params):
01919   options = params['options']
01920   msvs_version = params['msvs_version']
01921   devenv = os.path.join(msvs_version.path, 'Common7', 'IDE', 'devenv.com')
01922 
01923   for build_file, build_file_dict in data.iteritems():
01924     (build_file_root, build_file_ext) = os.path.splitext(build_file)
01925     if build_file_ext != '.gyp':
01926       continue
01927     sln_path = build_file_root + options.suffix + '.sln'
01928     if options.generator_output:
01929       sln_path = os.path.join(options.generator_output, sln_path)
01930 
01931   for config in configurations:
01932     arguments = [devenv, sln_path, '/Build', config]
01933     print 'Building [%s]: %s' % (config, arguments)
01934     rtn = subprocess.check_call(arguments)
01935 
01936 
01937 def GenerateOutput(target_list, target_dicts, data, params):
01938   """Generate .sln and .vcproj files.
01939 
01940   This is the entry point for this generator.
01941   Arguments:
01942     target_list: List of target pairs: 'base/base.gyp:base'.
01943     target_dicts: Dict of target properties keyed on target pair.
01944     data: Dictionary containing per .gyp data.
01945   """
01946   global fixpath_prefix
01947 
01948   options = params['options']
01949 
01950   # Get the project file format version back out of where we stashed it in
01951   # GeneratorCalculatedVariables.
01952   msvs_version = params['msvs_version']
01953 
01954   generator_flags = params.get('generator_flags', {})
01955 
01956   # Optionally shard targets marked with 'msvs_shard': SHARD_COUNT.
01957   (target_list, target_dicts) = MSVSUtil.ShardTargets(target_list, target_dicts)
01958 
01959   # Optionally use the large PDB workaround for targets marked with
01960   # 'msvs_large_pdb': 1.
01961   (target_list, target_dicts) = MSVSUtil.InsertLargePdbShims(
01962         target_list, target_dicts, generator_default_variables)
01963 
01964   # Optionally configure each spec to use ninja as the external builder.
01965   if params.get('flavor') == 'ninja':
01966     _InitNinjaFlavor(params, target_list, target_dicts)
01967 
01968   # Prepare the set of configurations.
01969   configs = set()
01970   for qualified_target in target_list:
01971     spec = target_dicts[qualified_target]
01972     for config_name, config in spec['configurations'].iteritems():
01973       configs.add(_ConfigFullName(config_name, config))
01974   configs = list(configs)
01975 
01976   # Figure out all the projects that will be generated and their guids
01977   project_objects = _CreateProjectObjects(target_list, target_dicts, options,
01978                                           msvs_version)
01979 
01980   # Generate each project.
01981   missing_sources = []
01982   for project in project_objects.values():
01983     fixpath_prefix = project.fixpath_prefix
01984     missing_sources.extend(_GenerateProject(project, options, msvs_version,
01985                                             generator_flags))
01986   fixpath_prefix = None
01987 
01988   for build_file in data:
01989     # Validate build_file extension
01990     if not build_file.endswith('.gyp'):
01991       continue
01992     sln_path = os.path.splitext(build_file)[0] + options.suffix + '.sln'
01993     if options.generator_output:
01994       sln_path = os.path.join(options.generator_output, sln_path)
01995     # Get projects in the solution, and their dependents.
01996     sln_projects = gyp.common.BuildFileTargets(target_list, build_file)
01997     sln_projects += gyp.common.DeepDependencyTargets(target_dicts, sln_projects)
01998     # Create folder hierarchy.
01999     root_entries = _GatherSolutionFolders(
02000         sln_projects, project_objects, flat=msvs_version.FlatSolution())
02001     # Create solution.
02002     sln = MSVSNew.MSVSSolution(sln_path,
02003                                entries=root_entries,
02004                                variants=configs,
02005                                websiteProperties=False,
02006                                version=msvs_version)
02007     sln.Write()
02008 
02009   if missing_sources:
02010     error_message = "Missing input files:\n" + \
02011                     '\n'.join(set(missing_sources))
02012     if generator_flags.get('msvs_error_on_missing_sources', False):
02013       raise GypError(error_message)
02014     else:
02015       print >> sys.stdout, "Warning: " + error_message
02016 
02017 
02018 def _GenerateMSBuildFiltersFile(filters_path, source_files,
02019                                 rule_dependencies, extension_to_rule_name):
02020   """Generate the filters file.
02021 
02022   This file is used by Visual Studio to organize the presentation of source
02023   files into folders.
02024 
02025   Arguments:
02026       filters_path: The path of the file to be created.
02027       source_files: The hierarchical structure of all the sources.
02028       extension_to_rule_name: A dictionary mapping file extensions to rules.
02029   """
02030   filter_group = []
02031   source_group = []
02032   _AppendFiltersForMSBuild('', source_files, rule_dependencies,
02033                            extension_to_rule_name, filter_group, source_group)
02034   if filter_group:
02035     content = ['Project',
02036                {'ToolsVersion': '4.0',
02037                 'xmlns': 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003'
02038                },
02039                ['ItemGroup'] + filter_group,
02040                ['ItemGroup'] + source_group
02041               ]
02042     easy_xml.WriteXmlIfChanged(content, filters_path, pretty=True, win32=True)
02043   elif os.path.exists(filters_path):
02044     # We don't need this filter anymore.  Delete the old filter file.
02045     os.unlink(filters_path)
02046 
02047 
02048 def _AppendFiltersForMSBuild(parent_filter_name, sources, rule_dependencies,
02049                              extension_to_rule_name,
02050                              filter_group, source_group):
02051   """Creates the list of filters and sources to be added in the filter file.
02052 
02053   Args:
02054       parent_filter_name: The name of the filter under which the sources are
02055           found.
02056       sources: The hierarchy of filters and sources to process.
02057       extension_to_rule_name: A dictionary mapping file extensions to rules.
02058       filter_group: The list to which filter entries will be appended.
02059       source_group: The list to which source entries will be appeneded.
02060   """
02061   for source in sources:
02062     if isinstance(source, MSVSProject.Filter):
02063       # We have a sub-filter.  Create the name of that sub-filter.
02064       if not parent_filter_name:
02065         filter_name = source.name
02066       else:
02067         filter_name = '%s\\%s' % (parent_filter_name, source.name)
02068       # Add the filter to the group.
02069       filter_group.append(
02070           ['Filter', {'Include': filter_name},
02071            ['UniqueIdentifier', MSVSNew.MakeGuid(source.name)]])
02072       # Recurse and add its dependents.
02073       _AppendFiltersForMSBuild(filter_name, source.contents,
02074                                rule_dependencies, extension_to_rule_name,
02075                                filter_group, source_group)
02076     else:
02077       # It's a source.  Create a source entry.
02078       _, element = _MapFileToMsBuildSourceType(source, rule_dependencies,
02079                                                extension_to_rule_name)
02080       source_entry = [element, {'Include': source}]
02081       # Specify the filter it is part of, if any.
02082       if parent_filter_name:
02083         source_entry.append(['Filter', parent_filter_name])
02084       source_group.append(source_entry)
02085 
02086 
02087 def _MapFileToMsBuildSourceType(source, rule_dependencies,
02088                                 extension_to_rule_name):
02089   """Returns the group and element type of the source file.
02090 
02091   Arguments:
02092       source: The source file name.
02093       extension_to_rule_name: A dictionary mapping file extensions to rules.
02094 
02095   Returns:
02096       A pair of (group this file should be part of, the label of element)
02097   """
02098   _, ext = os.path.splitext(source)
02099   if ext in extension_to_rule_name:
02100     group = 'rule'
02101     element = extension_to_rule_name[ext]
02102   elif ext in ['.cc', '.cpp', '.c', '.cxx']:
02103     group = 'compile'
02104     element = 'ClCompile'
02105   elif ext in ['.h', '.hxx']:
02106     group = 'include'
02107     element = 'ClInclude'
02108   elif ext == '.rc':
02109     group = 'resource'
02110     element = 'ResourceCompile'
02111   elif ext == '.asm':
02112     group = 'masm'
02113     element = 'MASM'
02114   elif ext == '.idl':
02115     group = 'midl'
02116     element = 'Midl'
02117   elif source in rule_dependencies:
02118     group = 'rule_dependency'
02119     element = 'CustomBuild'
02120   else:
02121     group = 'none'
02122     element = 'None'
02123   return (group, element)
02124 
02125 
02126 def _GenerateRulesForMSBuild(output_dir, options, spec,
02127                              sources, excluded_sources,
02128                              props_files_of_rules, targets_files_of_rules,
02129                              actions_to_add, rule_dependencies,
02130                              extension_to_rule_name):
02131   # MSBuild rules are implemented using three files: an XML file, a .targets
02132   # file and a .props file.
02133   # See http://blogs.msdn.com/b/vcblog/archive/2010/04/21/quick-help-on-vs2010-custom-build-rule.aspx
02134   # for more details.
02135   rules = spec.get('rules', [])
02136   rules_native = [r for r in rules if not int(r.get('msvs_external_rule', 0))]
02137   rules_external = [r for r in rules if int(r.get('msvs_external_rule', 0))]
02138 
02139   msbuild_rules = []
02140   for rule in rules_native:
02141     # Skip a rule with no action and no inputs.
02142     if 'action' not in rule and not rule.get('rule_sources', []):
02143       continue
02144     msbuild_rule = MSBuildRule(rule, spec)
02145     msbuild_rules.append(msbuild_rule)
02146     rule_dependencies.update(msbuild_rule.additional_dependencies.split(';'))
02147     extension_to_rule_name[msbuild_rule.extension] = msbuild_rule.rule_name
02148   if msbuild_rules:
02149     base = spec['target_name'] + options.suffix
02150     props_name = base + '.props'
02151     targets_name = base + '.targets'
02152     xml_name = base + '.xml'
02153 
02154     props_files_of_rules.add(props_name)
02155     targets_files_of_rules.add(targets_name)
02156 
02157     props_path = os.path.join(output_dir, props_name)
02158     targets_path = os.path.join(output_dir, targets_name)
02159     xml_path = os.path.join(output_dir, xml_name)
02160 
02161     _GenerateMSBuildRulePropsFile(props_path, msbuild_rules)
02162     _GenerateMSBuildRuleTargetsFile(targets_path, msbuild_rules)
02163     _GenerateMSBuildRuleXmlFile(xml_path, msbuild_rules)
02164 
02165   if rules_external:
02166     _GenerateExternalRules(rules_external, output_dir, spec,
02167                            sources, options, actions_to_add)
02168   _AdjustSourcesForRules(rules, sources, excluded_sources, True)
02169 
02170 
02171 class MSBuildRule(object):
02172   """Used to store information used to generate an MSBuild rule.
02173 
02174   Attributes:
02175     rule_name: The rule name, sanitized to use in XML.
02176     target_name: The name of the target.
02177     after_targets: The name of the AfterTargets element.
02178     before_targets: The name of the BeforeTargets element.
02179     depends_on: The name of the DependsOn element.
02180     compute_output: The name of the ComputeOutput element.
02181     dirs_to_make: The name of the DirsToMake element.
02182     inputs: The name of the _inputs element.
02183     tlog: The name of the _tlog element.
02184     extension: The extension this rule applies to.
02185     description: The message displayed when this rule is invoked.
02186     additional_dependencies: A string listing additional dependencies.
02187     outputs: The outputs of this rule.
02188     command: The command used to run the rule.
02189   """
02190 
02191   def __init__(self, rule, spec):
02192     self.display_name = rule['rule_name']
02193     # Assure that the rule name is only characters and numbers
02194     self.rule_name = re.sub(r'\W', '_', self.display_name)
02195     # Create the various element names, following the example set by the
02196     # Visual Studio 2008 to 2010 conversion.  I don't know if VS2010
02197     # is sensitive to the exact names.
02198     self.target_name = '_' + self.rule_name
02199     self.after_targets = self.rule_name + 'AfterTargets'
02200     self.before_targets = self.rule_name + 'BeforeTargets'
02201     self.depends_on = self.rule_name + 'DependsOn'
02202     self.compute_output = 'Compute%sOutput' % self.rule_name
02203     self.dirs_to_make = self.rule_name + 'DirsToMake'
02204     self.inputs = self.rule_name + '_inputs'
02205     self.tlog = self.rule_name + '_tlog'
02206     self.extension = rule['extension']
02207     if not self.extension.startswith('.'):
02208       self.extension = '.' + self.extension
02209 
02210     self.description = MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(
02211         rule.get('message', self.rule_name))
02212     old_additional_dependencies = _FixPaths(rule.get('inputs', []))
02213     self.additional_dependencies = (
02214         ';'.join([MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(i)
02215                   for i in old_additional_dependencies]))
02216     old_outputs = _FixPaths(rule.get('outputs', []))
02217     self.outputs = ';'.join([MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(i)
02218                              for i in old_outputs])
02219     old_command = _BuildCommandLineForRule(spec, rule, has_input_path=True,
02220                                            do_setup_env=True)
02221     self.command = MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(old_command)
02222 
02223 
02224 def _GenerateMSBuildRulePropsFile(props_path, msbuild_rules):
02225   """Generate the .props file."""
02226   content = ['Project',
02227              {'xmlns': 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003'}]
02228   for rule in msbuild_rules:
02229     content.extend([
02230         ['PropertyGroup',
02231          {'Condition': "'$(%s)' == '' and '$(%s)' == '' and "
02232           "'$(ConfigurationType)' != 'Makefile'" % (rule.before_targets,
02233                                                     rule.after_targets)
02234          },
02235          [rule.before_targets, 'Midl'],
02236          [rule.after_targets, 'CustomBuild'],
02237         ],
02238         ['PropertyGroup',
02239          [rule.depends_on,
02240           {'Condition': "'$(ConfigurationType)' != 'Makefile'"},
02241           '_SelectedFiles;$(%s)' % rule.depends_on
02242          ],
02243         ],
02244         ['ItemDefinitionGroup',
02245          [rule.rule_name,
02246           ['CommandLineTemplate', rule.command],
02247           ['Outputs', rule.outputs],
02248           ['ExecutionDescription', rule.description],
02249           ['AdditionalDependencies', rule.additional_dependencies],
02250          ],
02251         ]
02252     ])
02253   easy_xml.WriteXmlIfChanged(content, props_path, pretty=True, win32=True)
02254 
02255 
02256 def _GenerateMSBuildRuleTargetsFile(targets_path, msbuild_rules):
02257   """Generate the .targets file."""
02258   content = ['Project',
02259              {'xmlns': 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003'
02260              }
02261             ]
02262   item_group = [
02263       'ItemGroup',
02264       ['PropertyPageSchema',
02265        {'Include': '$(MSBuildThisFileDirectory)$(MSBuildThisFileName).xml'}
02266       ]
02267     ]
02268   for rule in msbuild_rules:
02269     item_group.append(
02270         ['AvailableItemName',
02271          {'Include': rule.rule_name},
02272          ['Targets', rule.target_name],
02273         ])
02274   content.append(item_group)
02275 
02276   for rule in msbuild_rules:
02277     content.append(
02278         ['UsingTask',
02279          {'TaskName': rule.rule_name,
02280           'TaskFactory': 'XamlTaskFactory',
02281           'AssemblyName': 'Microsoft.Build.Tasks.v4.0'
02282          },
02283          ['Task', '$(MSBuildThisFileDirectory)$(MSBuildThisFileName).xml'],
02284         ])
02285   for rule in msbuild_rules:
02286     rule_name = rule.rule_name
02287     target_outputs = '%%(%s.Outputs)' % rule_name
02288     target_inputs = ('%%(%s.Identity);%%(%s.AdditionalDependencies);'
02289                      '$(MSBuildProjectFile)') % (rule_name, rule_name)
02290     rule_inputs = '%%(%s.Identity)' % rule_name
02291     extension_condition = ("'%(Extension)'=='.obj' or "
02292                            "'%(Extension)'=='.res' or "
02293                            "'%(Extension)'=='.rsc' or "
02294                            "'%(Extension)'=='.lib'")
02295     remove_section = [
02296         'ItemGroup',
02297         {'Condition': "'@(SelectedFiles)' != ''"},
02298         [rule_name,
02299          {'Remove': '@(%s)' % rule_name,
02300           'Condition': "'%(Identity)' != '@(SelectedFiles)'"
02301          }
02302         ]
02303     ]
02304     inputs_section = [
02305         'ItemGroup',
02306         [rule.inputs, {'Include': '%%(%s.AdditionalDependencies)' % rule_name}]
02307     ]
02308     logging_section = [
02309         'ItemGroup',
02310         [rule.tlog,
02311          {'Include': '%%(%s.Outputs)' % rule_name,
02312           'Condition': ("'%%(%s.Outputs)' != '' and "
02313                         "'%%(%s.ExcludedFromBuild)' != 'true'" %
02314                         (rule_name, rule_name))
02315          },
02316          ['Source', "@(%s, '|')" % rule_name],
02317          ['Inputs', "@(%s -> '%%(Fullpath)', ';')" % rule.inputs],
02318         ],
02319     ]
02320     message_section = [
02321         'Message',
02322         {'Importance': 'High',
02323          'Text': '%%(%s.ExecutionDescription)' % rule_name
02324         }
02325     ]
02326     write_tlog_section = [
02327         'WriteLinesToFile',
02328         {'Condition': "'@(%s)' != '' and '%%(%s.ExcludedFromBuild)' != "
02329          "'true'" % (rule.tlog, rule.tlog),
02330          'File': '$(IntDir)$(ProjectName).write.1.tlog',
02331          'Lines': "^%%(%s.Source);@(%s->'%%(Fullpath)')" % (rule.tlog,
02332                                                             rule.tlog)
02333         }
02334     ]
02335     read_tlog_section = [
02336         'WriteLinesToFile',
02337         {'Condition': "'@(%s)' != '' and '%%(%s.ExcludedFromBuild)' != "
02338          "'true'" % (rule.tlog, rule.tlog),
02339          'File': '$(IntDir)$(ProjectName).read.1.tlog',
02340          'Lines': "^%%(%s.Source);%%(%s.Inputs)" % (rule.tlog, rule.tlog)
02341         }
02342     ]
02343     command_and_input_section = [
02344         rule_name,
02345         {'Condition': "'@(%s)' != '' and '%%(%s.ExcludedFromBuild)' != "
02346          "'true'" % (rule_name, rule_name),
02347          'CommandLineTemplate': '%%(%s.CommandLineTemplate)' % rule_name,
02348          'AdditionalOptions': '%%(%s.AdditionalOptions)' % rule_name,
02349          'Inputs': rule_inputs
02350         }
02351     ]
02352     content.extend([
02353         ['Target',
02354          {'Name': rule.target_name,
02355           'BeforeTargets': '$(%s)' % rule.before_targets,
02356           'AfterTargets': '$(%s)' % rule.after_targets,
02357           'Condition': "'@(%s)' != ''" % rule_name,
02358           'DependsOnTargets': '$(%s);%s' % (rule.depends_on,
02359                                             rule.compute_output),
02360           'Outputs': target_outputs,
02361           'Inputs': target_inputs
02362          },
02363          remove_section,
02364          inputs_section,
02365          logging_section,
02366          message_section,
02367          write_tlog_section,
02368          read_tlog_section,
02369          command_and_input_section,
02370         ],
02371         ['PropertyGroup',
02372          ['ComputeLinkInputsTargets',
02373           '$(ComputeLinkInputsTargets);',
02374           '%s;' % rule.compute_output
02375          ],
02376          ['ComputeLibInputsTargets',
02377           '$(ComputeLibInputsTargets);',
02378           '%s;' % rule.compute_output
02379          ],
02380         ],
02381         ['Target',
02382          {'Name': rule.compute_output,
02383           'Condition': "'@(%s)' != ''" % rule_name
02384          },
02385          ['ItemGroup',
02386           [rule.dirs_to_make,
02387            {'Condition': "'@(%s)' != '' and "
02388             "'%%(%s.ExcludedFromBuild)' != 'true'" % (rule_name, rule_name),
02389             'Include': '%%(%s.Outputs)' % rule_name
02390            }
02391           ],
02392           ['Link',
02393            {'Include': '%%(%s.Identity)' % rule.dirs_to_make,
02394             'Condition': extension_condition
02395            }
02396           ],
02397           ['Lib',
02398            {'Include': '%%(%s.Identity)' % rule.dirs_to_make,
02399             'Condition': extension_condition
02400            }
02401           ],
02402           ['ImpLib',
02403            {'Include': '%%(%s.Identity)' % rule.dirs_to_make,
02404             'Condition': extension_condition
02405            }
02406           ],
02407          ],
02408          ['MakeDir',
02409           {'Directories': ("@(%s->'%%(RootDir)%%(Directory)')" %
02410                            rule.dirs_to_make)
02411           }
02412          ]
02413         ],
02414     ])
02415   easy_xml.WriteXmlIfChanged(content, targets_path, pretty=True, win32=True)
02416 
02417 
02418 def _GenerateMSBuildRuleXmlFile(xml_path, msbuild_rules):
02419   # Generate the .xml file
02420   content = [
02421       'ProjectSchemaDefinitions',
02422       {'xmlns': ('clr-namespace:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes;'
02423                  'assembly=Microsoft.Build.Framework'),

02595 
02596 def _GetConfigurationAndPlatform(name, settings):
02597   configuration = name.rsplit('_', 1)[0]
02598   platform = settings.get('msvs_configuration_platform', 'Win32')
02599   return (configuration, platform)
02600 
02601 
02602 def _GetConfigurationCondition(name, settings):
02603   return (r"'$(Configuration)|$(Platform)'=='%s|%s'" %
02604           _GetConfigurationAndPlatform(name, settings))
02605 
02606 
02607 def _GetMSBuildProjectConfigurations(configurations):
02608   group = ['ItemGroup', {'Label': 'ProjectConfigurations'}]
02609   for (name, settings) in sorted(configurations.iteritems()):
02610     configuration, platform = _GetConfigurationAndPlatform(name, settings)
02611     designation = '%s|%s' % (configuration, platform)
02612     group.append(
02613         ['ProjectConfiguration', {'Include': designation},
02614          ['Configuration', configuration],
02615          ['Platform', platform]])
02616   return [group]
02617 
02618 
02619 def _GetMSBuildGlobalProperties(spec, guid, gyp_file_name):
02620   namespace = os.path.splitext(gyp_file_name)[0]
02621   properties = [
02622       ['PropertyGroup', {'Label': 'Globals'},
02623         ['ProjectGuid', guid],
02624         ['Keyword', 'Win32Proj'],
02625         ['RootNamespace', namespace],
02626         ['IgnoreWarnCompileDuplicatedFilename', 'true'],
02627       ]
02628     ]
02629 
02630   if os.environ.get('PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE') == 'AMD64' or \
02631      os.environ.get('PROCESSOR_ARCHITEW6432') == 'AMD64':
02632     properties[0].append(['PreferredToolArchitecture', 'x64'])
02633 
02634   if spec.get('msvs_enable_winrt'):
02635     properties[0].append(['DefaultLanguage', 'en-US'])
02636     properties[0].append(['AppContainerApplication', 'true'])
02637     properties[0].append(['ApplicationTypeRevision', '8.1'])
02638 
02639     if spec.get('msvs_enable_winphone'):
02640       properties[0].append(['ApplicationType', 'Windows Phone'])
02641     else:
02642       properties[0].append(['ApplicationType', 'Windows Store'])
02643 
02644   return properties
02645 
02646 def _GetMSBuildConfigurationDetails(spec, build_file):
02647   properties = {}
02648   for name, settings in spec['configurations'].iteritems():
02649     msbuild_attributes = _GetMSBuildAttributes(spec, settings, build_file)
02650     condition = _GetConfigurationCondition(name, settings)
02651     character_set = msbuild_attributes.get('CharacterSet')
02652     _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'ConfigurationType',
02653                             msbuild_attributes['ConfigurationType'])
02654     if character_set:
02655       if 'msvs_enable_winrt' not in spec :
02656         _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'CharacterSet',
02657                                 character_set)
02658   return _GetMSBuildPropertyGroup(spec, 'Configuration', properties)
02659 
02660 
02661 def _GetMSBuildLocalProperties(msbuild_toolset):
02662   # Currently the only local property we support is PlatformToolset
02663   properties = {}
02664   if msbuild_toolset:
02665     properties = [
02666         ['PropertyGroup', {'Label': 'Locals'},
02667           ['PlatformToolset', msbuild_toolset],
02668         ]
02669       ]
02670   return properties
02671 
02672 
02673 def _GetMSBuildPropertySheets(configurations):
02674   user_props = r'$(UserRootDir)\Microsoft.Cpp.$(Platform).user.props'
02675   additional_props = {}
02676   props_specified = False
02677   for name, settings in sorted(configurations.iteritems()):
02678     configuration = _GetConfigurationCondition(name, settings)
02679     if settings.has_key('msbuild_props'):
02680       additional_props[configuration] = _FixPaths(settings['msbuild_props'])
02681       props_specified = True
02682     else:
02683      additional_props[configuration] = ''
02684 
02685   if not props_specified:
02686     return [
02687         ['ImportGroup',
02688          {'Label': 'PropertySheets'},
02689          ['Import',
02690           {'Project': user_props,
02691            'Condition': "exists('%s')" % user_props,
02692            'Label': 'LocalAppDataPlatform'
02693           }
02694          ]
02695         ]
02696     ]
02697   else:
02698     sheets = []
02699     for condition, props in additional_props.iteritems():
02700       import_group = [
02701         'ImportGroup',
02702         {'Label': 'PropertySheets',
02703          'Condition': condition
02704         },
02705         ['Import',
02706          {'Project': user_props,
02707           'Condition': "exists('%s')" % user_props,
02708           'Label': 'LocalAppDataPlatform'
02709          }
02710         ]
02711       ]
02712       for props_file in props:
02713         import_group.append(['Import', {'Project':props_file}])
02714       sheets.append(import_group)
02715     return sheets
02716 
02717 def _ConvertMSVSBuildAttributes(spec, config, build_file):
02718   config_type = _GetMSVSConfigurationType(spec, build_file)
02719   msvs_attributes = _GetMSVSAttributes(spec, config, config_type)
02720   msbuild_attributes = {}
02721   for a in msvs_attributes:
02722     if a in ['IntermediateDirectory', 'OutputDirectory']:
02723       directory = MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(msvs_attributes[a])
02724       if not directory.endswith('\\'):
02725         directory += '\\'
02726       msbuild_attributes[a] = directory
02727     elif a == 'CharacterSet':
02728       msbuild_attributes[a] = _ConvertMSVSCharacterSet(msvs_attributes[a])
02729     elif a == 'ConfigurationType':
02730       msbuild_attributes[a] = _ConvertMSVSConfigurationType(msvs_attributes[a])
02731     else:
02732       print 'Warning: Do not know how to convert MSVS attribute ' + a
02733   return msbuild_attributes
02734 
02735 
02736 def _ConvertMSVSCharacterSet(char_set):
02737   if char_set.isdigit():
02738     char_set = {
02739         '0': 'MultiByte',
02740         '1': 'Unicode',
02741         '2': 'MultiByte',
02742     }[char_set]
02743   return char_set
02744 
02745 
02746 def _ConvertMSVSConfigurationType(config_type):
02747   if config_type.isdigit():
02748     config_type = {
02749         '1': 'Application',
02750         '2': 'DynamicLibrary',
02751         '4': 'StaticLibrary',
02752         '10': 'Utility'
02753     }[config_type]
02754   return config_type
02755 
02756 
02757 def _GetMSBuildAttributes(spec, config, build_file):
02758   if 'msbuild_configuration_attributes' not in config:
02759     msbuild_attributes = _ConvertMSVSBuildAttributes(spec, config, build_file)
02760 
02761   else:
02762     config_type = _GetMSVSConfigurationType(spec, build_file)
02763     config_type = _ConvertMSVSConfigurationType(config_type)
02764     msbuild_attributes = config.get('msbuild_configuration_attributes', {})
02765     msbuild_attributes.setdefault('ConfigurationType', config_type)
02766     output_dir = msbuild_attributes.get('OutputDirectory',
02767                                       '$(SolutionDir)$(Configuration)')
02768     msbuild_attributes['OutputDirectory'] = _FixPath(output_dir) + '\\'
02769     if 'IntermediateDirectory' not in msbuild_attributes:
02770       intermediate = _FixPath('$(Configuration)') + '\\'
02771       msbuild_attributes['IntermediateDirectory'] = intermediate
02772     if 'CharacterSet' in msbuild_attributes:
02773       msbuild_attributes['CharacterSet'] = _ConvertMSVSCharacterSet(
02774           msbuild_attributes['CharacterSet'])
02775   if 'TargetName' not in msbuild_attributes:
02776     prefix = spec.get('product_prefix', '')
02777     product_name = spec.get('product_name', '$(ProjectName)')
02778     target_name = prefix + product_name
02779     msbuild_attributes['TargetName'] = target_name
02780   if 'TargetExt' not in msbuild_attributes and 'product_extension' in spec:
02781     ext = spec.get('product_extension')
02782     msbuild_attributes['TargetExt'] = '.' + ext
02783 
02784   if spec.get('msvs_external_builder'):
02785     external_out_dir = spec.get('msvs_external_builder_out_dir', '.')
02786     msbuild_attributes['OutputDirectory'] = _FixPath(external_out_dir) + '\\'
02787 
02788   # Make sure that 'TargetPath' matches 'Lib.OutputFile' or 'Link.OutputFile'
02789   # (depending on the tool used) to avoid MSB8012 warning.
02790   msbuild_tool_map = {
02791       'executable': 'Link',
02792       'shared_library': 'Link',
02793       'loadable_module': 'Link',
02794       'static_library': 'Lib',
02795   }
02796   msbuild_tool = msbuild_tool_map.get(spec['type'])
02797   if msbuild_tool:
02798     msbuild_settings = config['finalized_msbuild_settings']
02799     out_file = msbuild_settings[msbuild_tool].get('OutputFile')
02800     if out_file:
02801       msbuild_attributes['TargetPath'] = _FixPath(out_file)
02802     target_ext = msbuild_settings[msbuild_tool].get('TargetExt')
02803     if target_ext:
02804       msbuild_attributes['TargetExt'] = target_ext
02805 
02806   return msbuild_attributes
02807 
02808 
02809 def _GetMSBuildConfigurationGlobalProperties(spec, configurations, build_file):
02810   # TODO(jeanluc) We could optimize out the following and do it only if
02811   # there are actions.
02812   # TODO(jeanluc) Handle the equivalent of setting 'CYGWIN=nontsec'.
02813   new_paths = []
02814   cygwin_dirs = spec.get('msvs_cygwin_dirs', ['.'])[0]
02815   if cygwin_dirs:
02816     cyg_path = '$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)\\%s\\bin\\' % _FixPath(cygwin_dirs)
02817     new_paths.append(cyg_path)
02818     # TODO(jeanluc) Change the convention to have both a cygwin_dir and a
02819     # python_dir.
02820     python_path = cyg_path.replace('cygwin\\bin', 'python_26')
02821     new_paths.append(python_path)
02822     if new_paths:
02823       new_paths = '$(ExecutablePath);' + ';'.join(new_paths)
02824 
02825   properties = {}
02826   for (name, configuration) in sorted(configurations.iteritems()):
02827     condition = _GetConfigurationCondition(name, configuration)
02828     attributes = _GetMSBuildAttributes(spec, configuration, build_file)
02829     msbuild_settings = configuration['finalized_msbuild_settings']
02830     _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'IntDir',
02831                             attributes['IntermediateDirectory'])
02832     _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'OutDir',
02833                             attributes['OutputDirectory'])
02834     _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'TargetName',
02835                             attributes['TargetName'])
02836     if 'TargetExt' in attributes:
02837       _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'TargetExt',
02838                               attributes['TargetExt'])
02839 
02840     if attributes.get('TargetPath'):
02841       _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'TargetPath',
02842                               attributes['TargetPath'])
02843     if attributes.get('TargetExt'):
02844       _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'TargetExt',
02845                               attributes['TargetExt'])
02846 
02847     if new_paths:
02848       _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, 'ExecutablePath',
02849                               new_paths)
02850     tool_settings = msbuild_settings.get('', {})
02851     for name, value in sorted(tool_settings.iteritems()):
02852       formatted_value = _GetValueFormattedForMSBuild('', name, value)
02853       _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, name, formatted_value)
02854   return _GetMSBuildPropertyGroup(spec, None, properties)
02855 
02856 
02857 def _AddConditionalProperty(properties, condition, name, value):
02858   """Adds a property / conditional value pair to a dictionary.
02859 
02860   Arguments:
02861     properties: The dictionary to be modified.  The key is the name of the
02862         property.  The value is itself a dictionary; its key is the value and
02863         the value a list of condition for which this value is true.
02864     condition: The condition under which the named property has the value.
02865     name: The name of the property.
02866     value: The value of the property.
02867   """
02868   if name not in properties:
02869     properties[name] = {}
02870   values = properties[name]
02871   if value not in values:
02872     values[value] = []
02873   conditions = values[value]
02874   conditions.append(condition)
02875 
02876 
02877 # Regex for msvs variable references ( i.e. $(FOO) ).
02878 MSVS_VARIABLE_REFERENCE = re.compile(r'\$\(([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)\)')
02879 
02880 
02881 def _GetMSBuildPropertyGroup(spec, label, properties):
02882   """Returns a PropertyGroup definition for the specified properties.
02883 
02884   Arguments:
02885     spec: The target project dict.
02886     label: An optional label for the PropertyGroup.
02887     properties: The dictionary to be converted.  The key is the name of the
02888         property.  The value is itself a dictionary; its key is the value and
02889         the value a list of condition for which this value is true.
02890   """
02891   group = ['PropertyGroup']
02892   if label:
02893     group.append({'Label': label})
02894   num_configurations = len(spec['configurations'])
02895   def GetEdges(node):
02896     # Use a definition of edges such that user_of_variable -> used_varible.
02897     # This happens to be easier in this case, since a variable's
02898     # definition contains all variables it references in a single string.
02899     edges = set()
02900     for value in sorted(properties[node].keys()):
02901       # Add to edges all $(...) references to variables.
02902       #
02903       # Variable references that refer to names not in properties are excluded
02904       # These can exist for instance to refer built in definitions like
02905       # $(SolutionDir).
02906       #
02907       # Self references are ignored. Self reference is used in a few places to
02908       # append to the default value. I.e. PATH=$(PATH);other_path
02909       edges.update(set([v for v in MSVS_VARIABLE_REFERENCE.findall(value)
02910                         if v in properties and v != node]))
02911     return edges
02912   properties_ordered = gyp.common.TopologicallySorted(
02913       properties.keys(), GetEdges)
02914   # Walk properties in the reverse of a topological sort on
02915   # user_of_variable -> used_variable as this ensures variables are
02916   # defined before they are used.
02917   # NOTE: reverse(topsort(DAG)) = topsort(reverse_edges(DAG))
02918   for name in reversed(properties_ordered):
02919     values = properties[name]
02920     for value, conditions in sorted(values.iteritems()):
02921       if len(conditions) == num_configurations:
02922         # If the value is the same all configurations,
02923         # just add one unconditional entry.
02924         group.append([name, value])
02925       else:
02926         for condition in conditions:
02927           group.append([name, {'Condition': condition}, value])
02928   return [group]
02929 
02930 
02931 def _GetMSBuildToolSettingsSections(spec, configurations):
02932   groups = []
02933   for (name, configuration) in sorted(configurations.iteritems()):
02934     msbuild_settings = configuration['finalized_msbuild_settings']
02935     group = ['ItemDefinitionGroup',
02936              {'Condition': _GetConfigurationCondition(name, configuration)}
02937             ]
02938     for tool_name, tool_settings in sorted(msbuild_settings.iteritems()):
02939       # Skip the tool named '' which is a holder of global settings handled
02940       # by _GetMSBuildConfigurationGlobalProperties.
02941       if tool_name:
02942         if tool_settings:
02943           tool = [tool_name]
02944           for name, value in sorted(tool_settings.iteritems()):
02945             formatted_value = _GetValueFormattedForMSBuild(tool_name, name,
02946                                                            value)
02947             tool.append([name, formatted_value])
02948           group.append(tool)
02949     groups.append(group)
02950   return groups
02951 
02952 
02953 def _FinalizeMSBuildSettings(spec, configuration):
02954   if 'msbuild_settings' in configuration:
02955     converted = False
02956     msbuild_settings = configuration['msbuild_settings']
02957     MSVSSettings.ValidateMSBuildSettings(msbuild_settings)
02958   else:
02959     converted = True
02960     msvs_settings = configuration.get('msvs_settings', {})
02961     msbuild_settings = MSVSSettings.ConvertToMSBuildSettings(msvs_settings)
02962   include_dirs, midl_include_dirs, resource_include_dirs = \
02963       _GetIncludeDirs(configuration)
02964   libraries = _GetLibraries(spec)
02965   library_dirs = _GetLibraryDirs(configuration)
02966   out_file, _, msbuild_tool = _GetOutputFilePathAndTool(spec, msbuild=True)
02967   target_ext = _GetOutputTargetExt(spec)
02968   defines = _GetDefines(configuration)
02969   if converted:
02970     # Visual Studio 2010 has TR1
02971     defines = [d for d in defines if d != '_HAS_TR1=0']
02972     # Warn of ignored settings
02973     ignored_settings = ['msvs_tool_files']
02974     for ignored_setting in ignored_settings:
02975       value = configuration.get(ignored_setting)
02976       if value:
02977         print ('Warning: The automatic conversion to MSBuild does not handle '
02978                '%s.  Ignoring setting of %s' % (ignored_setting, str(value)))
02979 
02980   defines = [_EscapeCppDefineForMSBuild(d) for d in defines]
02981   disabled_warnings = _GetDisabledWarnings(configuration)
02982   prebuild = configuration.get('msvs_prebuild')
02983   postbuild = configuration.get('msvs_postbuild')
02984   def_file = _GetModuleDefinition(spec)
02985   precompiled_header = configuration.get('msvs_precompiled_header')
02986 
02987   # Add the information to the appropriate tool
02988   # TODO(jeanluc) We could optimize and generate these settings only if
02989   # the corresponding files are found, e.g. don't generate ResourceCompile
02990   # if you don't have any resources.
02991   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile',
02992               'AdditionalIncludeDirectories', include_dirs)
02993   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'Midl',
02994               'AdditionalIncludeDirectories', midl_include_dirs)
02995   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ResourceCompile',
02996               'AdditionalIncludeDirectories', resource_include_dirs)
02997   # Add in libraries, note that even for empty libraries, we want this
02998   # set, to prevent inheriting default libraries from the enviroment.
02999   _ToolSetOrAppend(msbuild_settings, 'Link', 'AdditionalDependencies',
03000                   libraries)
03001   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'Link', 'AdditionalLibraryDirectories',
03002               library_dirs)
03003   if out_file:
03004     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, msbuild_tool, 'OutputFile', out_file,
03005                 only_if_unset=True)
03006   if target_ext:
03007     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, msbuild_tool, 'TargetExt', target_ext,
03008                 only_if_unset=True)
03009   # Add defines.
03010   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile',
03011               'PreprocessorDefinitions', defines)
03012   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ResourceCompile',
03013               'PreprocessorDefinitions', defines)
03014   # Add disabled warnings.
03015   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile',
03016               'DisableSpecificWarnings', disabled_warnings)
03017   # Turn on precompiled headers if appropriate.
03018   if precompiled_header:
03019     precompiled_header = os.path.split(precompiled_header)[1]
03020     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile', 'PrecompiledHeader', 'Use')
03021     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile',
03022                 'PrecompiledHeaderFile', precompiled_header)
03023     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile',
03024                 'ForcedIncludeFiles', [precompiled_header])
03025   else:
03026     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile', 'PrecompiledHeader', 'NotUsing')
03027   # Turn off WinRT compilation
03028   _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'ClCompile', 'CompileAsWinRT', 'false')
03029   # Turn on import libraries if appropriate
03030   if spec.get('msvs_requires_importlibrary'):
03031    _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, '', 'IgnoreImportLibrary', 'false')
03032   # Loadable modules don't generate import libraries;
03033   # tell dependent projects to not expect one.
03034   if spec['type'] == 'loadable_module':
03035     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, '', 'IgnoreImportLibrary', 'true')
03036   # Set the module definition file if any.
03037   if def_file:
03038     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'Link', 'ModuleDefinitionFile', def_file)
03039   configuration['finalized_msbuild_settings'] = msbuild_settings
03040   if prebuild:
03041     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'PreBuildEvent', 'Command', prebuild)
03042   if postbuild:
03043     _ToolAppend(msbuild_settings, 'PostBuildEvent', 'Command', postbuild)
03044 
03045 
03046 def _GetValueFormattedForMSBuild(tool_name, name, value):
03047   if type(value) == list:
03048     # For some settings, VS2010 does not automatically extends the settings
03049     # TODO(jeanluc) Is this what we want?
03050     if name in ['AdditionalIncludeDirectories',
03051                 'AdditionalLibraryDirectories',
03052                 'AdditionalOptions',
03053                 'DelayLoadDLLs',
03054                 'DisableSpecificWarnings',
03055                 'PreprocessorDefinitions']:
03056       value.append('%%(%s)' % name)
03057     # For most tools, entries in a list should be separated with ';' but some
03058     # settings use a space.  Check for those first.
03059     exceptions = {
03060         'ClCompile': ['AdditionalOptions'],
03061         'Link': ['AdditionalOptions'],
03062         'Lib': ['AdditionalOptions']}
03063     if tool_name in exceptions and name in exceptions[tool_name]:
03064       char = ' '
03065     else:
03066       char = ';'
03067     formatted_value = char.join(
03068         [MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(i) for i in value])
03069   else:
03070     formatted_value = MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(value)
03071   return formatted_value
03072 
03073 
03074 def _VerifySourcesExist(sources, root_dir):
03075   """Verifies that all source files exist on disk.
03076 
03077   Checks that all regular source files, i.e. not created at run time,
03078   exist on disk.  Missing files cause needless recompilation but no otherwise
03079   visible errors.
03080 
03081   Arguments:
03082     sources: A recursive list of Filter/file names.
03083     root_dir: The root directory for the relative path names.
03084   Returns:
03085     A list of source files that cannot be found on disk.
03086   """
03087   missing_sources = []
03088   for source in sources:
03089     if isinstance(source, MSVSProject.Filter):
03090       missing_sources.extend(_VerifySourcesExist(source.contents, root_dir))
03091     else:
03092       if '$' not in source:
03093         full_path = os.path.join(root_dir, source)
03094         if not os.path.exists(full_path):
03095           missing_sources.append(full_path)
03096   return missing_sources
03097 
03098 
03099 def _GetMSBuildSources(spec, sources, exclusions, rule_dependencies,
03100                        extension_to_rule_name, actions_spec,
03101                        sources_handled_by_action, list_excluded):
03102   groups = ['none', 'masm', 'midl', 'include', 'compile', 'resource', 'rule',
03103             'rule_dependency']
03104   grouped_sources = {}
03105   for g in groups:
03106     grouped_sources[g] = []
03107 
03108   _AddSources2(spec, sources, exclusions, grouped_sources,
03109                rule_dependencies, extension_to_rule_name,
03110                sources_handled_by_action, list_excluded)
03111   sources = []
03112   for g in groups:
03113     if grouped_sources[g]:
03114       sources.append(['ItemGroup'] + grouped_sources[g])
03115   if actions_spec:
03116     sources.append(['ItemGroup'] + actions_spec)
03117   return sources
03118 
03119 
03120 def _AddSources2(spec, sources, exclusions, grouped_sources,
03121                  rule_dependencies, extension_to_rule_name,
03122                  sources_handled_by_action,
03123                  list_excluded):
03124   extensions_excluded_from_precompile = []
03125   for source in sources:
03126     if isinstance(source, MSVSProject.Filter):
03127       _AddSources2(spec, source.contents, exclusions, grouped_sources,
03128                    rule_dependencies, extension_to_rule_name,
03129                    sources_handled_by_action,
03130                    list_excluded)
03131     else:
03132       if not source in sources_handled_by_action:
03133         detail = []
03134         excluded_configurations = exclusions.get(source, [])
03135         if len(excluded_configurations) == len(spec['configurations']):
03136           detail.append(['ExcludedFromBuild', 'true'])
03137         else:
03138           for config_name, configuration in sorted(excluded_configurations):
03139             condition = _GetConfigurationCondition(config_name, configuration)
03140             detail.append(['ExcludedFromBuild',
03141                            {'Condition': condition},
03142                            'true'])
03143         # Add precompile if needed
03144         for config_name, configuration in spec['configurations'].iteritems():
03145           precompiled_source = configuration.get('msvs_precompiled_source', '')
03146           if precompiled_source != '':
03147             precompiled_source = _FixPath(precompiled_source)
03148             if not extensions_excluded_from_precompile:
03149               # If the precompiled header is generated by a C source, we must
03150               # not try to use it for C++ sources, and vice versa.
03151               basename, extension = os.path.splitext(precompiled_source)
03152               if extension == '.c':
03153                 extensions_excluded_from_precompile = ['.cc', '.cpp', '.cxx']
03154               else:
03155                 extensions_excluded_from_precompile = ['.c']
03156 
03157           if precompiled_source == source:
03158             condition = _GetConfigurationCondition(config_name, configuration)
03159             detail.append(['PrecompiledHeader',
03160                            {'Condition': condition},
03161                            'Create'
03162                           ])
03163           else:
03164             # Turn off precompiled header usage for source files of a
03165             # different type than the file that generated the
03166             # precompiled header.
03167             for extension in extensions_excluded_from_precompile:
03168               if source.endswith(extension):
03169                 detail.append(['PrecompiledHeader', ''])
03170                 detail.append(['ForcedIncludeFiles', ''])
03171 
03172         group, element = _MapFileToMsBuildSourceType(source, rule_dependencies,
03173                                                      extension_to_rule_name)
03174         grouped_sources[group].append([element, {'Include': source}] + detail)
03175 
03176 
03177 def _GetMSBuildProjectReferences(project):
03178   references = []
03179   if project.dependencies:
03180     group = ['ItemGroup']
03181     for dependency in project.dependencies:
03182       guid = dependency.guid
03183       project_dir = os.path.split(project.path)[0]
03184       relative_path = gyp.common.RelativePath(dependency.path, project_dir)
03185       project_ref = ['ProjectReference',
03186           {'Include': relative_path},
03187           ['Project', guid],
03188           ['ReferenceOutputAssembly', 'false']
03189           ]
03190       for config in dependency.spec.get('configurations', {}).itervalues():
03191         # If it's disabled in any config, turn it off in the reference.
03192         if config.get('msvs_2010_disable_uldi_when_referenced', 0):
03193           project_ref.append(['UseLibraryDependencyInputs', 'false'])
03194           break
03195       group.append(project_ref)
03196     references.append(group)
03197   return references
03198 
03199 
03200 def _GenerateMSBuildProject(project, options, version, generator_flags):
03201   spec = project.spec
03202   configurations = spec['configurations']
03203   project_dir, project_file_name = os.path.split(project.path)
03204   gyp.common.EnsureDirExists(project.path)
03205   # Prepare list of sources and excluded sources.
03206   gyp_path = _NormalizedSource(project.build_file)
03207   relative_path_of_gyp_file = gyp.common.RelativePath(gyp_path, project_dir)
03208 
03209   gyp_file = os.path.split(project.build_file)[1]
03210   sources, excluded_sources = _PrepareListOfSources(spec, generator_flags,
03211                                                     gyp_file)
03212   # Add rules.
03213   actions_to_add = {}
03214   props_files_of_rules = set()
03215   targets_files_of_rules = set()
03216   rule_dependencies = set()
03217   extension_to_rule_name = {}
03218   list_excluded = generator_flags.get('msvs_list_excluded_files', True)
03219 
03220   # Don't generate rules if we are using an external builder like ninja.
03221   if not spec.get('msvs_external_builder'):
03222     _GenerateRulesForMSBuild(project_dir, options, spec,
03223                              sources, excluded_sources,
03224                              props_files_of_rules, targets_files_of_rules,
03225                              actions_to_add, rule_dependencies,
03226                              extension_to_rule_name)
03227   else:
03228     rules = spec.get('rules', [])
03229     _AdjustSourcesForRules(rules, sources, excluded_sources, True)
03230 
03231   sources, excluded_sources, excluded_idl = (
03232       _AdjustSourcesAndConvertToFilterHierarchy(spec, options,
03233                                                 project_dir, sources,
03234                                                 excluded_sources,
03235                                                 list_excluded, version))
03236 
03237   # Don't add actions if we are using an external builder like ninja.
03238   if not spec.get('msvs_external_builder'):
03239     _AddActions(actions_to_add, spec, project.build_file)
03240     _AddCopies(actions_to_add, spec)
03241 
03242     # NOTE: this stanza must appear after all actions have been decided.
03243     # Don't excluded sources with actions attached, or they won't run.
03244     excluded_sources = _FilterActionsFromExcluded(
03245         excluded_sources, actions_to_add)
03246 
03247   exclusions = _GetExcludedFilesFromBuild(spec, excluded_sources, excluded_idl)
03248   actions_spec, sources_handled_by_action = _GenerateActionsForMSBuild(
03249       spec, actions_to_add)
03250 
03251   _GenerateMSBuildFiltersFile(project.path + '.filters', sources,
03252                               rule_dependencies,
03253                               extension_to_rule_name)
03254   missing_sources = _VerifySourcesExist(sources, project_dir)
03255 
03256   for configuration in configurations.itervalues():
03257     _FinalizeMSBuildSettings(spec, configuration)
03258 
03259   # Add attributes to root element
03260 
03261   import_default_section = [
03262       ['Import', {'Project': r'$(VCTargetsPath)\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props'}]]
03263   import_cpp_props_section = [
03264       ['Import', {'Project': r'$(VCTargetsPath)\Microsoft.Cpp.props'}]]
03265   import_cpp_targets_section = [
03266       ['Import', {'Project': r'$(VCTargetsPath)\Microsoft.Cpp.targets'}]]
03267   import_masm_props_section = [
03268       ['Import',
03269         {'Project': r'$(VCTargetsPath)\BuildCustomizations\masm.props'}]]
03270   import_masm_targets_section = [
03271       ['Import',
03272         {'Project': r'$(VCTargetsPath)\BuildCustomizations\masm.targets'}]]
03273   macro_section = [['PropertyGroup', {'Label': 'UserMacros'}]]
03274 
03275   content = [
03276       'Project',
03277       {'xmlns': 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003',
03278        'ToolsVersion': version.ProjectVersion(),
03279        'DefaultTargets': 'Build'
03280       }]
03281 
03282   content += _GetMSBuildProjectConfigurations(configurations)
03283   content += _GetMSBuildGlobalProperties(spec, project.guid, project_file_name)
03284   content += import_default_section
03285   content += _GetMSBuildConfigurationDetails(spec, project.build_file)
03286   if spec.get('msvs_enable_winphone'):
03287    content += _GetMSBuildLocalProperties('v120_wp81')
03288   else:
03289    content += _GetMSBuildLocalProperties(project.msbuild_toolset)
03290   content += import_cpp_props_section
03291   content += import_masm_props_section
03292   content += _GetMSBuildExtensions(props_files_of_rules)
03293   content += _GetMSBuildPropertySheets(configurations)
03294   content += macro_section
03295   content += _GetMSBuildConfigurationGlobalProperties(spec, configurations,
03296                                                       project.build_file)
03297   content += _GetMSBuildToolSettingsSections(spec, configurations)
03298   content += _GetMSBuildSources(
03299       spec, sources, exclusions, rule_dependencies, extension_to_rule_name,
03300       actions_spec, sources_handled_by_action, list_excluded)
03301   content += _GetMSBuildProjectReferences(project)
03302   content += import_cpp_targets_section
03303   content += import_masm_targets_section
03304   content += _GetMSBuildExtensionTargets(targets_files_of_rules)
03305 
03306   if spec.get('msvs_external_builder'):
03307     content += _GetMSBuildExternalBuilderTargets(spec)
03308 
03309   # TODO(jeanluc) File a bug to get rid of runas.  We had in MSVS:
03310   # has_run_as = _WriteMSVSUserFile(project.path, version, spec)
03311 
03312   easy_xml.WriteXmlIfChanged(content, project.path, pretty=True, win32=True)
03313 
03314   return missing_sources
03315 
03316 
03317 def _GetMSBuildExternalBuilderTargets(spec):
03318   """Return a list of MSBuild targets for external builders.
03319 
03320   The "Build" and "Clean" targets are always generated.  If the spec contains
03321   'msvs_external_builder_clcompile_cmd', then the "ClCompile" target will also
03322   be generated, to support building selected C/C++ files.
03323 
03324   Arguments:
03325     spec: The gyp target spec.
03326   Returns:
03327     List of MSBuild 'Target' specs.
03328   """
03329   build_cmd = _BuildCommandLineForRuleRaw(
03330       spec, spec['msvs_external_builder_build_cmd'],
03331       False, False, False, False)
03332   build_target = ['Target', {'Name': 'Build'}]
03333   build_target.append(['Exec', {'Command': build_cmd}])
03334 
03335   clean_cmd = _BuildCommandLineForRuleRaw(
03336       spec, spec['msvs_external_builder_clean_cmd'],
03337       False, False, False, False)
03338   clean_target = ['Target', {'Name': 'Clean'}]
03339   clean_target.append(['Exec', {'Command': clean_cmd}])
03340 
03341   targets = [build_target, clean_target]
03342 
03343   if spec.get('msvs_external_builder_clcompile_cmd'):
03344     clcompile_cmd = _BuildCommandLineForRuleRaw(
03345         spec, spec['msvs_external_builder_clcompile_cmd'],
03346         False, False, False, False)
03347     clcompile_target = ['Target', {'Name': 'ClCompile'}]
03348     clcompile_target.append(['Exec', {'Command': clcompile_cmd}])
03349     targets.append(clcompile_target)
03350 
03351   return targets
03352 
03353 
03354 def _GetMSBuildExtensions(props_files_of_rules):
03355   extensions = ['ImportGroup', {'Label': 'ExtensionSettings'}]
03356   for props_file in props_files_of_rules:
03357     extensions.append(['Import', {'Project': props_file}])
03358   return [extensions]
03359 
03360 
03361 def _GetMSBuildExtensionTargets(targets_files_of_rules):
03362   targets_node = ['ImportGroup', {'Label': 'ExtensionTargets'}]
03363   for targets_file in sorted(targets_files_of_rules):
03364     targets_node.append(['Import', {'Project': targets_file}])
03365   return [targets_node]
03366 
03367 
03368 def _GenerateActionsForMSBuild(spec, actions_to_add):
03369   """Add actions accumulated into an actions_to_add, merging as needed.
03370 
03371   Arguments:
03372     spec: the target project dict
03373     actions_to_add: dictionary keyed on input name, which maps to a list of
03374         dicts describing the actions attached to that input file.
03375 
03376   Returns:
03377     A pair of (action specification, the sources handled by this action).
03378   """
03379   sources_handled_by_action = OrderedSet()
03380   actions_spec = []
03381   for primary_input, actions in actions_to_add.iteritems():
03382     inputs = OrderedSet()
03383     outputs = OrderedSet()
03384     descriptions = []
03385     commands = []
03386     for action in actions:
03387       inputs.update(OrderedSet(action['inputs']))
03388       outputs.update(OrderedSet(action['outputs']))
03389       descriptions.append(action['description'])
03390       cmd = action['command']
03391       # For most actions, add 'call' so that actions that invoke batch files
03392       # return and continue executing.  msbuild_use_call provides a way to
03393       # disable this but I have not seen any adverse effect from doing that
03394       # for everything.
03395       if action.get('msbuild_use_call', True):
03396         cmd = 'call ' + cmd
03397       commands.append(cmd)
03398     # Add the custom build action for one input file.
03399     description = ', and also '.join(descriptions)
03400 
03401     # We can't join the commands simply with && because the command line will
03402     # get too long. See also _AddActions: cygwin's setup_env mustn't be called
03403     # for every invocation or the command that sets the PATH will grow too
03404     # long.
03405     command = '\r\n'.join([c + '\r\nif %errorlevel% neq 0 exit /b %errorlevel%'
03406                            for c in commands])
03407     _AddMSBuildAction(spec,
03408                       primary_input,
03409                       inputs,
03410                       outputs,
03411                       command,
03412                       description,
03413                       sources_handled_by_action,
03414                       actions_spec)
03415   return actions_spec, sources_handled_by_action
03416 
03417 
03418 def _AddMSBuildAction(spec, primary_input, inputs, outputs, cmd, description,
03419                       sources_handled_by_action, actions_spec):
03420   command = MSVSSettings.ConvertVCMacrosToMSBuild(cmd)
03421   primary_input = _FixPath(primary_input)
03422   inputs_array = _FixPaths(inputs)
03423   outputs_array = _FixPaths(outputs)
03424   additional_inputs = ';'.join([i for i in inputs_array
03425                                 if i != primary_input])
03426   outputs = ';'.join(outputs_array)
03427   sources_handled_by_action.add(primary_input)
03428   action_spec = ['CustomBuild', {'Include': primary_input}]
03429   action_spec.extend(
03430       # TODO(jeanluc) 'Document' for all or just if as_sources?
03431       [['FileType', 'Document'],
03432        ['Command', command],
03433        ['Message', description],
03434        ['Outputs', outputs]
03435       ])
03436   if additional_inputs:
03437     action_spec.append(['AdditionalInputs', additional_inputs])
03438   actions_spec.append(action_spec)
Generated on Wed Oct 7 19:26:26 2015 for Emeraldion Lodge (codename Zelda) by  1.5.8
